content:
You are a web developer who wants to display the current date and time on a webpage, but you cannot use JavaScript. Instead, you must come up with a creative solution using only HTML and CSS.
Your challenge is to create a webpage that displays the current date and time, updating every second. The catch is that you cannot use any scripting languages or external libraries.
Think outside the box and use CSS animations, transitions, and other techniques to achieve this goal. Be creative and show off your skills in web design.
Hint: You can use the :after pseudo-element in CSS to add content to an element, and the content property can be used to add text to that element. You can also use the transform property to rotate, scale, or move elements.
